p: There are currently no antiviral drugs approved for the treatment of CoV-specific illnesses. Given the rapidly evolving pandemic of COVID-19, it is crucial for public health practitioners and the One Health community to stay up to date on potential therapeutic options that are under investigation [ 19]. Based on existing data, remdesivir is a promising candidate, and multi-site clinical trials of remdesivir are now underway among hospitalized adults with COVID-19 [ 20]. This review summarizes the knowledge to date on remdesivir as a therapeutic option for CoVs.
